name: An Unlikely Combo
description:
You play as a robot with the ability to manipulate platforms. You team up with a drone capable of shooting lasers. You are normally enemies, although this challenge will require you to cooperate. The drone hasn't realized that yet though. ;)

Credit:

Normal Music: 8 Bit Go" By HeatleyBros:

Boss Music: 8 Bit Evil" By HeatleyBros
